about_the_game:
About


This visual novel is a collection of alternative realities. How events would turn out and how they end will depend on your choices.

Visit wolf's den and solve his secret, or try to tame the wild beast.

Eat a pasty with mushrooms and experience something new, or feed it to the old lady, because it's her favorite filling.

Find out the real reason why Wolf attacked Red Riding Hood's Grandmother.

Features


  • Multiple endings
  • Thriller, melodrama and comedy inside one game
  • More than 150 colorful 3D scenes
  • Cross-platform
  • Steam trading cards
  • Steam achievements
  • Steam cloud

    Commercial version improvements.
  • New artwork (more than 250 images)
  • An additional quest line.
  • New quests and mini-games.
  • Text quest tutorial.
  • Steam achievements and trading cards.
  • Professional proofreading.
detailed_description:
About


This visual novel is a collection of alternative realities. How events would turn out and how they end will depend on your choices.

Visit wolf's den and solve his secret, or try to tame the wild beast.

Eat a pasty with mushrooms and experience something new, or feed it to the old lady, because it's her favorite filling.

Find out the real reason why Wolf attacked Red Riding Hood's Grandmother.

Features


  • Multiple endings
  • Thriller, melodrama and comedy inside one game
  • More than 150 colorful 3D scenes
  • Cross-platform
  • Steam trading cards
  • Steam achievements
  • Steam cloud

    Commercial version improvements.
  • New artwork (more than 250 images)
  • An additional quest line.
  • New quests and mini-games.
  • Text quest tutorial.
  • Steam achievements and trading cards.
  • Professional proofreading.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 13.04+, Fedora 18+, Arch, Gentoo, Debian
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 3 / Athlon 64 or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 330 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 13.04+, Fedora 18+, Arch, Gentoo, Debian
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 3 / Athlon 64 or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 330 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

reviews:
“A commendable project of a niche genre about the character of a folk tale. There are so many different branches of story development and hilarious situations that you look at its shortcomings with leniency.”
6.5/10 – Special Games Club
short_description: This visual novel is a collection of alternative realities. How events would turn out and how they end will depend on your choices. Visit wolf's den and solve his secret, or try to tame the wild beast. Eat a pasty with mushrooms and experience something new, or feed it to the old lady, because it's her favorite filling.
